fields.description:
Details:
After step 7 in test case 1021 in the [Debugger Test Plan|http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Debugger+Test+Plan], unexpected variables appear. However, when running the argtest on Rhino, extra variables do not appear after expanding it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new project in studio called debug_test
2. Move the js files form the debug test project in titanium_mobile_tests_internal
3. Refer to the test plan at http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Debugger+Test+Plan
4. Execute test case 1021 on V8

Actual: On V8, after expanding the arguments variable, extra variables appear. See attachment.
Expected: On Rhino, after expanding the arguments variable, no extra variable appears.
fields.summary: Android: Debugger - V8 - The arguments variable contains unexpected variables in the argtest
fields.environment:
SDK build: 1.8.0.1
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112281340
OS: Linux 10.04, Windows 7 and XP

comments.body: http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/Debugger+Test+Plan link displays Page not found error
Closing due to inactivity. If this issue still exists, please raise a new ticket.
